Title.evidence: This study aimed to investigate the association between preoperative platelet count and postoperative AKI in patients undergoing abdominal surgery.

Trial_Design.evidence: This retrospective cohort study utilized data from the INformative Surgical Patient dataset for Innovative Research Environment (INSPIRE) database.

Participants.evidence: patients who underwent abdominal surgery at Seoul National University Hospital from 2011 to 2020.

Objective.evidence: This study aimed to investigate the association between preoperative platelet count and postoperative AKI in patients undergoing abdominal surgery.

Number_Analysed.evidence: A total of 7,131 patients were included.

Result_Outcome.evidence: A significant inverse association was found between preoperative platelet count and postoperative AKI risk across all models (P for trend < 0.001 in unadjusted and partially adjusted models, 0.002 in fully adjusted model).
